title: Coat
description: blue jacket length with curved bottom edges; flared sides with side vents; lower back and side vents have embroidered appliqued strips in pink, green, red, blue, yellow, white, purple; neck trimmed with similar embroidered strips, 1-3/4\" wide, carried over to side front; center front and back seams; raglan attached sleeves with six horizontal bands of embroidery, batik, green silk, black and white fabric and unfinished embroidered designs; two short twist ties at PR underarm
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
